Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to requiring sex offenders to register authorized internet entities that such offender uses
Summary: Requires sex offenders to register authorized internet entities that such offender uses, including social media websites.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to requiring sex offenders to register authorized internet entities that such offender uses
